title: Can I get 90% scholarship in TALLENTEX without biology but by scoring in PCM IQ? I am in class 9 right now. - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes! That is absolutely possible! Because TALLNENTEX gives higher RANK on the basis of higher MARKS on IQ,MATH,PHYSICS,CHEMISTRY,BIO. So it is possible to get 90%, but you must get almost all question correct in IQ,MATH,PHYSICS,CHEMISTRY. Cheers!
